turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four pizzas medium from Bella Luna. I want them all to be meat lovers, but gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you for waiting, how many pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want all quarter meat lover pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so that's 4 medium meat lover's anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want from the beef good and free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, with the gluten free crust you'll be looking at $54.80 total okay?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your pizza will be ready in 30 minutes for pickup, anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good day, thank you so much.
